wallets.name: Gataca Wallet
wallets.description: Gataca Wallet is a mobile digital identity wallet enabling users to securely store and share reusable digital credentials—such as national IDs, proof of age, or diplomas—to easily authenticate in digital services. These credentials are digitized according to open standards (W3C Verifiable Credentials and ISO/IEC 18013-5), cryptographically signed by authorities, and protected with biometrics and strong encryption, to ensure authenticity and that the user remains in complete control of their data. Gataca Wallet complies with European regulations, including eIDAS 2.0, and has successfully passed EBSI Wallet Conformance Tests. It is available on both iOS and Android.
credentialStatusMethods: W3C Verifiable Credentials Status List v2021
features: Compliance with eIDAS 2.0 and EUDI Wallet reference architecture

wallets.name: Gataca Studio
wallets.description: Gataca Studio is a cloud-based digital identity platform enabling organizations to interact with ID wallets. From an intuitive dashboard, companies can manage credential issuance and verification to support simple, private, and compliant identity verification and authentication across digital services. Gataca Studio currently works with the Gataca Wallet and other ID wallets aligned with the EU Digital Identity Wallet and European Business Wallet requirements. Built on open standards, the platform supports multiple trust frameworks and integrates easily with existing systems through open APIs without dependence on a specific infrastructure.
credentialStatusMethods: W3C Verifiable Credentials Status List v2021
